---
title: "R basics"
author: "Angelika Merkel"
---

This course gives a brief introduction to R and R programming basics. The presentation is available [here](data/Introduction_to_R.14112023.pdf)

**Topics covered:**

* Why R and what is R?
* Introduction to RStudio
* Workflow best practices

* Practical session programming basics:
  + Classes and types of objects
  + Accessing objects
  + Functions
  + Control structures
 
* Practical session data analysis:
  + Importing/exporting data
  + Exploratory data analysis
  + Basic plots
 
For the practical session we follow Chapters 4, 9, 13 and 14 of the book by [D.Peng "R Programming for Data Science" (2022)](https://bookdown.org/rdpeng/rprogdatascience/). The data analysis example can be found [here](Example_data_analysis.qmd).
